value.name: LAPD releases body cam footage of officers fatally shooting hostage, knife-wielding man
value.description: 32-year-old Guillermo Perez grabbed Elizabeth Tollison and appeared to cut her neck at a Los Angeles homeless center. Both were killed after police opened fire, and Tollison’s children have ...

value.name: Manhattan boro prez candidate Levine wants to change how MWBEs are hired by the city
value.description: Levine faces a crowded field of candidates in the Manhattan borough president’s race, which include Lindsey Boylan, Brad Hoylman, Ben Kallos, Elizabeth Caputo, Guillermo Perez and Kimberly Watkins.

value.name: US troops had to use their phones as flashlights to try to escape a sinking assault amphibious vehicle that killed 9 of them
